Name: Nitta Maru
Builder: Mitsubishi Shipbuilding & Engineering Co., Nagasaki, Japan
Fate:
Transferred to the Imperial Japanese Navy, 1942
Sunk by the submarine USS Sailfish, 4 December 1943
Displacement:
18,116 t (17,830 long tons) (standard)
20,321 t (20,000 long tons) (normal)
Armament:
4 × twin 12.7 cm (5 in) dual-purpose guns
4 × twin 25 mm (1.0 in) AA guns
